channel.title: Couple problems. [Delta]
channel.description:
Ok im kinda new to Runescape servers so I hope people will help me ;).
-Run doesn't work anymore -When i walk out of wildy there is still that skull icon (You cant attack) -We got a pk system but if you die you get +15 pk points.

item.title: Couple problems. [Delta]
item.dc:creator: @Maartenz Maartenz
item.description:
@Maartenz wrote:

[quote=“SirPali, post:2, topic:327506”]For the running, goto clickingmost.java (You’re using delta, so i’m assuming you have clicking most), and find

case 153:

Replace case 153 and 152 with

case 153: if (c.playerEnergy > 0) { c.isRunning2 = true; c.isRunning = true; } break; case 152: c.isRunning2 = false; c.isRunning = false; break;

For the skull icon, goto client.java and search for

, 199);

You will (or atleast should) find something like

if (isInWilderness(absX, absY, 1))
		{
			if (!hasWildySign)
			{
				hasWildySign = true;
				outStream.createFrame(208);
				outStream.writeWordBigEndian_dup(197);
				sendQuest("", 199); // De wildy text 	
			}
			int level = ((absY - 3520) / 8) + 1;
			if (level != wildyLevel)
			{
				wildyLevel = level;
				sendQuest("Level: " + wildyLevel, 199);
			}
		}

There you can set wether you want the skull or not.

outStream.createFrame(208); //this is the skull i believe

As for the PK system. I have no clue.

Good luck though![/quote]

Running is exactly the same. but not working [quote=“SirPali, post:2, topic:327506”]For the running, goto clickingmost.java (You’re using delta, so i’m assuming you have clicking most), and find

case 153:

Replace case 153 and 152 with

case 153: if (c.playerEnergy > 0) { c.isRunning2 = true; c.isRunning = true; } break; case 152: c.isRunning2 = false; c.isRunning = false; break;

For the skull icon, goto client.java and search for

, 199);

You will (or atleast should) find something like

if (isInWilderness(absX, absY, 1))
		{
			if (!hasWildySign)
			{
				hasWildySign = true;
				outStream.createFrame(208);
				outStream.writeWordBigEndian_dup(197);
				sendQuest("", 199); // De wildy text 	
			}
			int level = ((absY - 3520) / 8) + 1;
			if (level != wildyLevel)
			{
				wildyLevel = level;
				sendQuest("Level: " + wildyLevel, 199);
			}
		}

There you can set wether you want the skull or not.

outStream.createFrame(208); //this is the skull i believe

As for the PK system. I have no clue.

Good luck though![/quote]

Run is exactly the same but not working, And wildy code doesn’t work also.

Read full topic

item.title: Couple problems. [Delta]
item.dc:creator: @SirPali SirPali
item.description:
@SirPali wrote:

For the running, goto clickingmost.java (You’re using delta, so i’m assuming you have clicking most), and find

case 153:

Replace case 153 and 152 with

case 153: if (c.playerEnergy > 0) { c.isRunning2 = true; c.isRunning = true; } break; case 152: c.isRunning2 = false; c.isRunning = false; break;

For the skull icon, goto client.java and search for

, 199);

You will (or atleast should) find something like

if (isInWilderness(absX, absY, 1))
		{
			if (!hasWildySign)
			{
				hasWildySign = true;
				outStream.createFrame(208);
				outStream.writeWordBigEndian_dup(197);
				sendQuest("", 199); // De wildy text 	
			}
			int level = ((absY - 3520) / 8) + 1;
			if (level != wildyLevel)
			{
				wildyLevel = level;
				sendQuest("Level: " + wildyLevel, 199);
			}
		}

There you can set wether you want the skull or not.

outStream.createFrame(208); //this is the skull i believe

As for the PK system. I have no clue.

Good luck though!
